name: Bot Swarm 1.0.1
description:
You are a next generation robot being tested against swarms of mini bots. How long can you survive?

Look for flashing areas on walls...these are hidden places to enter and find goodies!

Move: arrow keys or WASD
Shoot: spacebar
Strafe: ctrl
Deploy Jammer: 1 or Z
Deploy Fire Blast: 2 or X
Deploy Turret: 3 or C
